Topic.Title: I dont know about shorting KO, but

Message.Msg: Remember that if you short it you are responsible for covering the dividend.
50 - $55 sounds about right in 18 months after the stock split!!
does coke pay dividend every quarter or every other quarter. Are Divy taxed when there given out.
It should be richly valued as the sell products in every part of the world. The poorest countries have their products.

Dividnds dates are: 1 April; 1July; 1October; 15 December. These dates have not changed in many years. Divends are taxed at the corporate level and then to the investor when they are paid out. Taken in cash or reinvested they are taxable income when they are paid out. I've been in coke for 12 years and have no plans to go elsewhere. One of my college summer jobs was in the local KO bottlers. Very dedicated and productive people.
